lines.text: We know from the book that <c=#FF00FF>status effects</c> on the target can make the spell backfire...
The burnt guy was kinda near that goat, right?
So maybe ''Goat Stank'' was the status effect!
What? I'm telling it like it is! Don't shoot the messenger!
It's... it's really not that bad.
Oh, yeah? Sticking up for the stank goat, huh?
Seeker, unless you're serious about... goat smell, being the status effect-
